thornhoof/entry-guard.about-silvertide:
The commanding officer of this town's milita. The backbone of this town, if you ask me.

She wants to see you, and believe me, you don't want to leave her expecting. She broke hooves harder than yours.
thornhoof/entry-guard.about-town:
You've reached Thornhoof. A city of the heights, a stronghold who's been holding against the Golden Herd for many moons.
And if you're still alive… well, that means you either work for them, or you could be useful working for us.
thornhoof/entry-guard.about-trouble: Good. We've got enough trouble as it is. And Silvertide wants to see you. Now.
thornhoof/entry-guard.go-to-meeting: Alright. Let's go meet Silvertide then.
thornhoof/entry-guard.introduction:
Well, well, well… the stranger finally got here. We've been monitoring you for a while. You brought the town's focus on yourself, and mayhaps not for the best reasons.

Follow me. Silvertide wants to see you.
thornhoof/entry-guard.no-getting-away: No. You come with us, and you meet Silvertide. I know it looks like I'm asking, but that's just because I'm polite. Truth is, I'm not asking you, I'm telling you.
thornhoof/entry-guard.on-go-to-meeting: Good lad. Lead the way, Silvertide's office is that way.
thornhoof/entry-guard.run-away: I heard your plea, and here's my rebuttal: catch me if you can ! [Run away]
thornhoof/entry-guard.try-to-go-away: I think I'd rather just go back on my own merry way.
thornhoof/entry-guard.whats-happening:
Are you for real ? The town is surrounded. Did you just waltz on past our assailants without noticing ?

No more caravans, no reinforcements. Raiders encircling us and yelling day and night, hoping we either starve or surrender.

If Silvertide thinks you've got a role to play, then you're going to listen to her.
